price: 134. Baye babimisaka na tango ya bisengo mpe na tango ya mpasi, mpe baye bakokaka kokanga nkanda te mpe baye balimbisaka bato, Mpe Allah alingaka bato ya bolamu.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُنفِقُونَ فِي ٱلسَّرَّآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ وَٱلۡكَٰظِمِينَ ٱلۡغَيۡظَ وَٱلۡعَافِينَ عَنِ ٱلنَّاسِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
